intro.message: Get ready, pilot! The space race is about to begin!
Use your voice to fly your ship. To fly left, say "LEFT." To fly right, say "RIGHT."
Collect stars to fly faster! When you see a star, try to catch it.
Good luck out there! I believe in you!

levels.message: The race is on! May the best space pilot win!
Don't forget to use your Zoom Boost! When you collect 5 stars, say "ZOOM!" to speed past the other racers!
Bah! You've pulled ahead of the rest, but you won't catch me!
Uh oh, Rocketor is passing you by! Your Time Shifter can slow down the race and buy you some time.  When you collect 10 stars, say "SLOW!
I see that you have made it! Finally, we can see who's the better pilot!

closing.message: You won! Congratulations on a race well flown!

intro.message: Rocketor's blown a gasket! He's ready for a rematch, but so are we!
With the money we won, I added a better radio and engines. Isn't she beautiful.
By the way, the next race, you'll have to race Rocketor again. Just keep flying like you did last time. See you at the finish line!

levels.message: So, we meet again. My new ship will leave you in the stardust!
You're doing great! Don't forget to say "ZOOM" and "SLOW" when it counts.
Hah! Let's see what you're made of!

closing.message: We did it! We're not done just yet. We'll need something big to win next time.

intro.message: Are you ready for one last race? It's our greatest challenge yet, so I've got a giant-sized surprise
Amazing, isn't it? I call it the Magni-Flyer.
Say “BIG” to make your ship bigger. This will help you catch faraway stars!
Good luck! See you at the finish line!

levels.message: So, you've got new tricks? Big deal! You won't win again, I'll see to that!
You're doing great! Don't forget to say “ZOOM" and "SLOW” when it counts.
Silly human, don't mock the great Rocketor!
Sometimes, you have to be the bigger person. Say “BIG” to get those hard to reach stars!

closing.message: You beat me three times, fair and square. You are the best Space Racer.
We did it! We're Space Race champions! Now it's time for some well deserved rest! See you next time! Fly high, Space Racer!
